dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.wf.wspec.WorkSpecificationType
dataStructure.description:
A classification that groups WorkSpecifications that share common characteristics. For example, Equipment maintenance work type, or network trouble shooting type. This class can be used to present a Catalog of work specifications.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: WorkSpecificationType

child.name: type
child.description:
The name of the type of WorkSpecification, used to group or catalog the works. For example, type can be ServiceInstallation Works, Infrastructure Works, etc.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: type

child.name: workSpecification
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association CategorizesWorkSpecs

This association end is optional
child.label: workSpecification
